name: tara-env-context
title: Environmental context of all samples from the Tara Oceans Expedition (2009-2013), about sensor data in the targeted environmental feature

resources.name: data
resources.title: Environmental context of all samples from the Tara Oceans Expedition (2009-2013), about sensor data in the targeted environmental feature

fields.name: Sample ID (TARA barcode)
fields.title: Sample ID
fields.description: TARA_barcode#, registered at PANGAEA, Data Publisher for Earth and Environmental Science

fields.name: Sample ID (BioSample)
fields.title: Sample ID
fields.description: BioSamples accession number (SAMEA#), registered at the BioSamples database

fields.name: Sample ID (ENA)
fields.title: Sample ID
fields.description: ENA sample accession number (ERS#), registered at the European Nucleotides Archive (ENA)

fields.name: Station
fields.title: Station label
fields.description: TARA_event-datetime_station#_event-type, registered at PANGAEA, Data Publisher for Earth and Environmental Science

fields.name: Env feature
fields.title: Environmental feature
fields.description: [abbreviation], full name (ENVO:ID) from which this sample was collected, terms registered at EnvO, the Environmental Ontology

fields.name: Depth, nominal
fields.title: Depth, nominal
fields.description: from which this sample was collected

fields.name: Depth top
fields.title: Depth, top/min
fields.description: from which this sample was collected

fields.name: Depth bot
fields.title: Depth, bottom/max
fields.description: from which this sample was collected

fields.name: Fraction lower
fields.title: Size fraction, lower threshold
fields.description: used on board to prepare samples, described in Pesant et al. (2017)

fields.name: Fraction upper
fields.title: Size fraction, upper threshold
fields.description: used on board to prepare samples, described in Pesant et al. (2017)

fields.name: Sample material
fields.title: Sample material
fields.description: TARA_station#_environmental-feature_size-fraction

fields.name: Sample method
fields.title: Sample method
fields.description: short label describing the target analysis (BGC=biogeochemistry, IMG=imaging, SEQ=sequencing) and specifics of the methodology and sampling device (N=net, W=pump/bottles/bucket, CW=concentrated by tangential filtration), described in Pesant et al. (2017)

fields.name: Sample label
fields.title: Sample code/label
fields.description: TARA_event-datetime_station#_event-type_environmental-feature_(depth)_protocol-label_size-fraction_sample-barcode

fields.name: Distance
fields.title: Distance
fields.description: interval between the location at which the sample was collected and that of the closest environmental context information

fields.name: Duration
fields.title: Duration
fields.description: interval between the date/time at which the sample was collected and that of the closest environmental context information, ISO 8601

fields.name: File name
fields.title: File name
fields.description: of sensor profiles that meet the criteria: distance lag <100 km and date/time lag <2 days

fields.name: NOBS
fields.title: Number of observations
fields.description: that meet the criteria: 10 m around the environmental feature nominal depth, distance lag <100 km and date/time lag <2 days

fields.name: Temp, min
fields.title: Temperature, water, minimum
fields.description: minimum value in the selected environmental feature around the sampling date and location, calculated from in situ sensor data, calibrated using factory settings

fields.name: Temp, lower quartile
fields.title: Temperature, water, lower quartile
fields.description: lower quartile value (25th percentile, first quartile, Q1) in the selected environmental feature around the sampling date and location, calculated from in situ sensor data, calibrated using factory settings

fields.name: Temp, median
fields.title: Temperature, water, median
fields.description: median value (50th percentile, second quartile, Q2) in the selected environmental feature around the sampling date and location, calculated from in situ sensor data, calibrated using factory settings

fields.name: Temp, upper quartile
fields.title: Temperature, water, upper quartile
fields.description: upper quartile value (75th percentile, third quartile, Q3) in the selected environmental feature around the sampling date and location, calculated from in situ sensor data, calibrated using factory settings

fields.name: Temp, max
fields.title: Temperature, water, maximum
fields.description: maximum value in the selected environmental feature around the sampling date and location, calculated from in situ sensor data, calibrated using factory settings

fields.name: bacp660, min
fields.title: Beam attenuation coefficient of particles, minimum
